The Basics of Armor Crafting --------------------------------------------------
1. Armor types - There are 7 basic armor types that a crafter can make. These range from a chain shirt to full plate armor.
2. Armor Materials - Armor can be crafted from Bronze, Iron, Platinum, Adamantium, Cobalt and Mithril. Armor may also be adorned with gold. Adorned armor has a higher AC than regular armor.
3. Armor Components - Armor requires ingots and a pattern.
4. Crafting Armor - To craft a set of armor, one must equip a smiths hammer, posess the required raw materials and use an armor crafting anvil.
5. Misc. Information - Armor may be smelted. Smelted armor generally yields two less ingots than were originally required.
6. Related Skills - Smelting, Tailoring, and Enchanting. Please read their respective books for more information about them.
